health.title: Campaign Health
health.description: Monitor campaign progress and performance metrics

pauseDialog.title: Pause Campaign
pauseDialog.description: This will stop new reader assignments. Readers in progress can complete.
pauseDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you pausing this campaign?

resumeDialog.title: Resume Campaign
resumeDialog.description: This will reactivate the campaign and resume queue processing.
resumeDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you resuming this campaign?

distributionDialog.title: Adjust Weekly Distribution
distributionDialog.description: Change the number of reviews distributed per week.
distributionDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you changing the distribution rate?

creditDialog.title: Allocate Credits to Campaign
creditDialog.description: Add credits from author balance to this campaign.

overbookingDialog.title: Adjust Overbooking
overbookingDialog.description: Change the overbooking percentage for this campaign.

forceCompleteDialog.title: Force Complete Campaign
forceCompleteDialog.description: Manually mark this campaign as completed regardless of progress.
forceCompleteDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you force completing this campaign?

grantAccessDialog.title: Manually Grant Reader Access
grantAccessDialog.description: Bypass the normal queue to grant a specific reader immediate access to this campaign.

removeReaderDialog.title: Remove Reader from Campaign
removeReaderDialog.description: Remove a reader's assignment from this campaign. This action can be logged and optionally notify the reader.

reportDialog.title: Campaign Report
reportDialog.description: Generate a detailed report of this campaign's performance.
